amendment.description: To provide funding for newborn and child screening for heritable disorders.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1627 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1627 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11322) To provide funding for newborn and child screening for heritable disorders.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1627 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1627 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1542.
